snippet: Berkshire Hathaway’s performance over the last four years has been disappointing. That’s likely to increase the chances of a cash payout, whether from Mr. Buffett or his successor, the author writes.
abstract: Berkshire Hathaway’s performance over the last four years has been disappointing. That’s likely to increase the chances of a cash payout, whether from Mr. Buffett or his successor, the author writes.

headline.main: Restless Shareholders May Force Buffett's Hand on Dividends
